ing: 1/4 cup maple syrup, or more to taste
2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste
des: "This is how I work some extra dark leafy greens into my kids' diet. Rich, chocolaty, and packed with anti-oxidants and vitamins. The perfect way to detox in the midst of a decadent holiday season. Add extra maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla or salt if needed. Enjoy!"
ins: Blend kale, blueberries, milk, apple juice, raspberries, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, and sea salt together in a blender until smooth.
